text:
Hi I'm using the
```post_filter```
function on a blog. However I'm also doing an author listing page as well.

Is there a way to set post_filter to only show results with the current author

Hi all,
is there a way how to change the max limit of `blog_recent_posts`  from 200 to 1000 for example?
According to the documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-recent-posts>
This function has a limit of 200 posts.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags>

Looks like you can set filter_type to author :slightly_smiling_face:
